website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced 49-key piano for those just starting out. Surprisingly versatile.
pros: A low price point model with a variety of sounds and settings
Powered by batteries or included power cord
Includes stickers to help beginners learn notes
cons: Keys are narrower than traditional piano keys

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. This arrived and was supposed to be my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. This arrived and was supposed to be my daughters birthday gift today but based on the condition of the item, i now have no gift for my little girl. How does this get through quality control at the mfg level??
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my first keyboard for both myself and my 5 year old to learn on. I’ve been a drummer my whole life so I’ve seen my fair share of top dollar electric keyboards. This is not one of those, nor should you expect it to be at this price. However, if you are looking for an outstanding value for a beginners keyboard this is right up your alley. The sound quality overall is very good. The keys aren’t weighted but they are pressure sensitive. It looks very sleek and so far it’s been a joy to play. I just wish I could actually play! Overall it’s an awesome beginner keyboard!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A.

customer_reviews.title: Not for android!
customer_reviews.text: You need an iPhone or iPad to use the trials it gives you. You get skoove and piano maestro but we cant use any of it because we are android users!!
customer_reviews.author: N&A

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two months and then half of the keys stopped working. Was told another would be shipped and have not seen anything yet.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Wright

customer_reviews.title: Whoa! Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond amazed at this purchase! So let me start by saying I am not a musician nor play the piano. I had read reviews saying tone issues etc. I paid less than 60.00 for this for a two year old who loves Johnny on the movie sing. What I received was a HUGE GIANT REGULAR KEY SIZE KEYBOARD!! I didn't realize the size of this and it's wonderful! Arrived in prime two days and has all that is stated in the advertisement. It's soooo nice and I'm beyond happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nm12

customer_reviews.title: Five stars from this mama!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for the price I was worried about the sound and quality. Manly because I couldn’t find a single review out there. Much to my surprise, a very well built piano. I couldn’t be more happy with it, key are weighted and has a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Glashan

customer_reviews.title: Sounds too electric (fake)
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable, but sound quality is poor. Sounds too much like an electric keyboard and not like a real piano. Also the first 6-8 keys on the keyboard do not sound right.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Scaffidi

customer_reviews.title: Chord doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: We have never been able to use this because the chord is finicky. You can’t push it directly in or it won’t work. You also have to wiggle the chord until it magically works....: and then stops working. We haven’t used batteries because takes 6 D batteries which are expensive. I got this keyboard because you didn’t have to use batteries and the chord doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Hillysh

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was concerned it would be very tinny-sounding. I am surprised at how good the piano on this keyboard sounds. Better than some much pricier models I have tested! I bought the sustain pedal to go with it. Mine did not come with the key stickers, so I had to go to a music store to get them separately...but for a beginner, this is a great full-size keyboard. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality charger connection on back popped out within the second day of use and company was no help on replacing or fixing it like stated in protection plan that was offered and bought.
customer_reviews.author: Bero

customer_reviews.title: Well, sound is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The sound is terrible, very distorted bass, and rest of the keys sound like an electronic toy. We realized that it would not provide similar to mechanical piano feel, but we expected much closer sound. Otherwise it is fine, construction is solid, look is good, keys, while not really weighted, are sensitive to the force of press and sensitivity is controllable. If sound was better it would be a very good instrument.
customer_reviews.author: gmy_gmy

customer_reviews.title: Item broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for his Birthday. He opened it today. When we took it out of the box we discovered it was broken. Unfortunately, the window to return it was 8 days ago. So what was supposed to be the present he wanted turned into a huge disappointment for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila e

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: love this alternative to having a traditional upright piano. spacesaver!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Jen Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am just learning to play the piano, and this is a great keyboard to learn on. My piano teacher even said that it is a good piano, even for an accomplished player. The sound is wonderful and it has different functions like base, guitar, percussion, 3 different keys of organ, 3 different keys of piano. I think it is an awesome keyboard for the price. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alan Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Keys... Resolve your problem QUICKLY!
customer_reviews.text: Key stuck and didn't realize the return window closed while I was try to resolve with Rock-Jam. Not a good experience from either Amazon or Rock-Jam.
customer_reviews.author: James Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Same complaints... not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! The first 6 keys don’t work.. 4 of them are stuck in a raised position. Totally unplayable. It came packed very well so I don’t know how it came broken. Reached out to the manufacturer and they said it was probably dropped and to take it up with Amazon and UPS. Terrible service from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broken.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working about a month after it was given as a gift to my daughter. It felt cheap, I should have sent it back right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fredericks

customer_reviews.title: Good but, I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old daughter just started piano lessons. Since I’m not rich, buying a full size piano is out of the question. We’ve had this for roughly 2 months and it’s worked great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: dana smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but has a flaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday. She received it yesterday, and loves it. It sounds pretty good, has a good feel, BUT there is one thing that has me worried. When you first power on her keyboard, it takes about 5 seconds for the sound to come on, and you hear a slight pop/crackle in the speaker when it does. I put in headphones to see if the sound was just a speaker or something else, and it has to be something else, cause you can hear it through the headphones. I have a little time before the window to return closes, so I will just see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: kati terlecki

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: They plaster the top of it with ugly advertisement stickers. Now I have residue left on mine from trying to remove these stickers. Additionally the note stickers that they mention was never included. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For...Almost
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid piano player, but can't roll my large piano everywhere I want to play. I was asked to do a short program for some children, and I didn't care about the quality of the keyboard for this performance, so I bought this one from Amazon. It looked okay, yet several of the keys didn't play unless you pressed them extra hard. That's hard to do when you are playing a song. I returned the product to Amazon within a day. Not worth the trouble. It may be okay for kids who are just playing around; not a serious student of the piano.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Keys are stiff. You'll need to press really hard to ger them to sound
customer_reviews.text: This digital piano looks good and is of great value but if you know a bit about playing, I think you will agree after your start using it that the keys are pretty stiff and you have to slam down on them to get the sound out.
customer_reviews.author: Olden Ebanks

customer_reviews.title: seller does not seem to care if product is defective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the keyboard for my great grand son's 6th birthday. he loves it. can ply several songs we recognise. has it just over one month when the middle c key stopped working. contacted amazon, no warranty. was given a small refund to apply to repairs we pay for. can find no one who can, did find on the reviews, middle c seems to stop for several purchase. now, I guess i will need to replace. NOT WITH THIS COMPANY. who sells something and does not stand behind it? don't take chance. buy something else from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Toni and Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Box was all crappy some of the keys didn’t work and was clearly from the early nineties
customer_reviews.author: jesse johnson

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard has a lot of fun settings and thingo to mess around with
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old. This keyboard has a lot of fun settings and thingo to mess around with. The only flaw in my opinion, is that the music holder. It is super flimsy and can't hold a normal music book, so we have it up against the wall so there's support.
customer_reviews.author: Djb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, a child's quality
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard's details said interactive LCD screen, well..it has one, soo small & on the control panel where you have to be sitting over it to see it. The piano sound, the only one I care about, is weak & hardly a true piano sound. It does have hundreds of other sounds that are useless if you want to play the piano. It also said it has pre re-recorded songs to listen to but I haven't been able to find them. This is best for a child only ,costs too much money for what you get. Also asked for Amazon packaging to conceal ti, didn't get it. Came fast tho, happy with Amazon's shipping. thx
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power cord is way too short.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is great. But the cord is extremely short. You would have to invest in batteries if you don't want to be stuck at an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: D's momma

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is way bigger than I thought it would be, but it certainly has lots of bells and whistles (literally!) to learn. The tone seems very good and if I give it some time I eventually will be playing a song or two.
customer_reviews.author: J. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard as a gift for my adult son. It worked for a couple of days and then the sound failed. This was $200 worth of hassle! Get a keyboard from another maker unless you want an unhappy kid for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this keyboard after reading all the reviews. Except my keyboard will not turn on. I reached out to the company and haven’t heard back. I’ve tried different outlets and it just won’t turn on. Really disappointed that I have to return this :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the keyboard does not record chords
customer_reviews.text: when you record chords all you get is a 1/4 second, sounds like ba! be! C,E,F sound like ba! ( stupid ) but when you don't record then the chord sounds good. <-- first problem --> second problem, after 3 months all the keys started sounding weird. it's echoing and the ( RHYTHM ) mode does not work no more. I can't play a proper song no more. the chords are WAY OFF, THE KEYS ARE WAY ECHOING.. i will not purchase anything from rockjam no more. i lost trust in their products... 54 keys and 61 keys are same cheap keyboard. lucky i didn't buy the 61 or 65 keys because it was expensive...
customer_reviews.author: tong lee

customer_reviews.title: Kids toy. Quickly outgrown.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard can only play two notes at the same time. If you try to press more than two keys at once (like to make a simple cord), only two notes will play simultaneously. After about a week, you'll need to get yourself a real keyboard (which you can buy for about $30 more). Save yourself the money and get yourself a proper keyboard to start with (see Casio, Yamaha, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Gob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, good quality, no issues, works perfectly. Bought it for my son but I think my wife likes it better.
customer_reviews.author: stpeelerd

customer_reviews.title: Kids Seem To Love It
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the one I ordered didn’t come with the “included AC adapter” so I’m extremely disappointed. Of course because of Covid -19 I can’t send it back for a replacement. Now I have to order an AC adapter because I don’t have an extra one. The description states numerous times that it comes with the power supply so that’s a huge bummer. I found some batteries and I can say that the keyboard sounds pretty nice. A little scratchy sometimes but for the price I can’t complain about that. My kids seemed to really like it and they’re beginners so I think this keyboard will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Not great sound quality, but seems good for a starter
customer_reviews.text: A perfect example of you only get what you pay for, the sound is cheap and tinny on basically all settings. The keys are small because it is a "portable" keyboard. We got this as a gift for our daughter though, and so far she seems to enjoy it. It did come with stickers to apply to the keys to teach reading music, and there is a code for an app which we have not tried yet. I will give an update to include thoughts on those
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod S.

customer_reviews.title: RJ-654 is fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: So , I wanted to learn piano and bought this as it was 50 USD. I then found a ton of reviews stating "it sucked", "it showed up broken" etc... Fortunately, mine seems to be ok, and it has reasonable sized keys even a really big dude like me can play, it's not a kiddie piano. it has tons of sounds, and rhythm tracks you can play around with, for 50 dollars, it's a blast, I hope you have a good time with it!
customer_reviews.author: Renard LeCray

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing a baby grand piano, and recently I wanted to start playing again. My current house has no room for even an upright piano so I went searching for a keyboard, but I definitely wanted one with a full keyboard and I found this! And I’m so glad that I did. I’ve always hated keyboards, but for the time being this will work and I’m just happy to be playing again. I’d definitely invest in a petal though.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica E.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Due to Covid, thought I'd try my hand at piano again, since only played a little when i was a kid. It's a good starter keyboard, some of the keys sound a tiny bit off, but it's fine for what I want to do with it. I got a charger, but no stickers & no instruction manual. The manual I was able to get online & I made my own stickers, as really needed them since rustier than anticipated. I use with headphones so don't disturb anyone & I'm having fun with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy. Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The piano played great and I thought the sound quality was good, If you purchase a sustain pedal it sounds 100% better. Was all well and good, until the piano started playing on its own. The display lights flicker on and off a lot and the piano just starts playing on its own. Very frustrating. Called amazon customer service and the best they could tell me was to change the outlets I plugged it into.
customer_reviews.author: Tulio Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice keyboard, but one piece was broken
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard took longer than expected to arrive. My 9-year-old daughter has been anxiously awaiting its arrival. It finally arrived this morning. Unfortunately, the music holder piece was broken. I contacted Amazon support to see if they could just send that piece. They advised that I would have to return the entire package and wait again. My daughter is so excited to have this keyboard, and is already practicing - I can't do that to her. I decided to try super glue and if that doesn't work, buy another one. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good, but adapter socket stopped working quickly
customer_reviews.text: works nice, good beginner keyboard for a child who wants to have fun Update: within a few weeks of purchase/use the adapter stopped working-the connection to the keyboard was defective. However amazon is great and accepted the return easily with free replacement.
customer_reviews.author: sdb

customer_reviews.title: Weighted Key Fail
customer_reviews.text: Received the first keyboard and c4 and d4 were not weighted and sounded loke a child's keyboard. 2nd 1 received c4 only is not semi weighted. I will deal with it. If you are a serious player of the ivories, pay for a Yamaha. If you are a dabbler like myself, it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than competitors
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he loves it! He has never played piano before. I previously purchased another keyboard on amazon from I think Plixio or something like that but it came with a few keys broken. I returned that one before buying this keyboard. This one is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mc

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this less than 3 months and it doesn't work at all. It doesn't turn on or make any noise. Cheaply made and unimpressive.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie Brownback

customer_reviews.title: Electronic Failure
customer_reviews.text: It has been less than 2 weeks since we purchased this item but already started to show signs of electronic failure making the product useless for intended purpose. Many keys, and some combination of keys, have started to produce loud noise when being pressed. Also when using headphone you can hear a loud noise which makes it annoying to continue. It's a pity since overall the product offers good features at a reasonable price. Alas we need to shop for a better keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Mann

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: The price definitely shows in this but I think it should be way cheaper because it doesn’t sound that good it also didn’t come with a power adapter, the music sheet stand, or the stickers. It also has a few spot on it where it’s clearly broken, I’m pretty disappointed and I’m pretty sure there’s no way to get those items without buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 11-year-old grandson. He’s enjoying it very much. Just purchased another one for our seven-year-old granddaughter. She sent us a video the first day showing herself playing Twinkle Twinkle Little Star!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old son went crazy for this at Christmas. He is extremely musical and has wanted a non toy keyboard for a while especially after having some exposure at school. He loves this one and is playing it everyday. Plus We love that it plugs in so no batteries needed if you don’t want and had a head phone plug for peace and quiet when Needed. We are excited to try learning to read sheet music a bit with the key note stickers. Know this will help grow his musical ability and maybe some lessons in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Weyant

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This was beyond my expectations! Love the LCD screen that shows what key you press and shows where the note is on the scale. Just started playing with it, but it has every function imaginable. This is perfect for my granddaughter to learn how to play. Comes with two free months of online live lessons and a $30 gift card for the piano maestro app to put on her tablet. The keys press smoothly and it is very durable. Also packaging was done very good for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product, Amazon should not allow these kinds of sellers.
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated with the deceptive advertising of this product. The picture showing the tablet and indicating a lcd screen. It seems purposefully misleading. Yes, now that I’m reading the small details where somebody had to ask the question they said that the screen was not actually included. I tried to buy a keyboard with a screen where she could use the free applications to teach her play.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 2 star.
customer_reviews.text: I think the sound of the quality are not good enough. The left sounds doesn’t really sound like what it should be. It does have a lot function that I think is difficult to the beginner to use all function. It’s weird that the c on the left instead of middle. So I feel my position is not right and don’t feel comfortable to play it. So I returned it immediately....
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Headphone Jack Defective, Otherwise OK for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good until I tried the headphone jack. There was a constant buzz as well as a click each time a key was pressed. Multiple sets of headphones confirmed the problem was in the keyboard. At this price point you can't expect top quality, but this was purchased specifically for practice using headphones only so as not to disturb the family so I'm returning it. Compact size is nice, as is the music stand. If the headphone jack is not important to you, this should be a suitable place to start. If you need to practice with headphones, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Beck

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a month !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he used it every day after we got it , in less then 2 weeks it’s started to sound static and like a weird noise. We did return it back and got our refund. The refund took a long time .
customer_reviews.author: vanessa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners and Good Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard. I compared similar keyboards for several days before deciding to purchase this one. I am extremely happy that I chose to go with this one. It has a great sound and there are so many options to choose from for sounds and beats. I like that you can plug it in and not have to rely on batteries. Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: piano for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product especially considering the price. The keys are not bad too much but have a bit heavier feeling when comparing with most cheap keyboards. But the cord is extremely short. Overall for the price it's a good beginner piano. Because of coronavirus I couldn't send it back for a while. However amazon is great and accepted the return easily.
customer_reviews.author: drahmet

customer_reviews.title: One-fourth of the keys do not work after only three months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a completely beginning piano student. Now with all classes on-line, the student really depends on this product. However, after only three months the lower fourth of the keyboard does not even make a sound. One of the pieces that the student will be graded on depends on these keys. I DO NOT recommend this product given my experience.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making two teenagers very happy, during self isolation ...
customer_reviews.text: You have brought music to our ears... the keyboard arrived this afternoon, and the sheer enjoyment makes it worth every single penny, Thank you for a wonderful product, at such an affordable price! Laura Ann R-T The Cookie Lady Boulder, Colorado
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Middle C key never worked!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 6 yr old to practice piano. Straight out of the box middle C key did not work. I'm aware that this is a low priced keyboard, but at least expected the quality to be good enough that all of the keys would function. Doesn’t say much for the manufacturer standards if they are shipping out product in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: brian e stevens

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. The family loves it from my 5 year old to me it is great. Like having a real piano.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The variety of sounds is good. However, there aren't good options for making it sound like an organ, but you can get close to that sound. The piano and other sounds are good. It is a good keyboard for beginners. We had a problem with the music rack which broke when it was pretty new. Also, two of the keys are loose. We have young children playing on it and it is great for them.
customer_reviews.author: bklyn_mama

customer_reviews.title: Santa brought this for my 8year old and my 8year old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo son decided he wanted to learn how to play the keyboard (because I bought him a guitar and a book to teach him how to play the guitar so naturally he never picked it up and wanted a keyboard 🤪). I didn’t want to start him out on a 300$ keyboard. When Santa brought this, his eyes lit up and he fell in love. He hasn’t had any issues yet and I think it sounds pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning it. All buttons work and everything but the sound is just so awful and the lowest volume setting is still super loud. The buttons aren’t even heavy like I anticipated, this is easily a $20 Walmart keyboard. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No batteries or plug
customer_reviews.text: Nice but didn't come with adapter/plug nor batteries so the excitement is gone as we are unable to try it out. The description says it comes with it but didn't find in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Garland

customer_reviews.title: Very low volume
customer_reviews.text: Well, for the price $150, maybe I shouldn’t complain. But this keyboard pretty much only worked for the first couple of times. Then the volume just doesn’t get out and we have to use combination of dual instruments sound to be able to barely hear it. I should have spent a little more for a more reliable one.
customer_reviews.author: wokingfool

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I am so very pleased with this keyboard. My daughter is taking her first keyboarding class in 6th grade this year. She wanted something for home to practice. I looked around and found that the keyboards were either professional grade and expensive, or more affordable and smaller versions. This keyboard is the perfect mix. It is about the same size as the ones she uses in class. She sounds great when playing it. We also like the app that will help her learn even more.
customer_reviews.author: jason vandeuren

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner keyboard
customer_reviews.text: A little nervous it wouldn’t work but it’s just fine for my 10 year old just learning. Light weight, decent quality and sound is ok. Differently not high end material but not a toy version either
customer_reviews.author: fourtoneys

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Does it feel exactly like a real piano? NO. Does it feel significantly better than any other digital keyboard I've ever used? YES speakers are solid too. There is a terrible amount of 'noise' if you plug in your headphones however so if you are planning on using the headphone jack a lot then this is not the keyboard for you
customer_reviews.author: Teri Giles

customer_reviews.title: Bass cleff notes don't sound like anything musical, useless for learning to or developing an ear
customer_reviews.text: I liked the stickers. Fairly simple to figure out how to operate. Easy enough return, if you don't mind spending the time... again. Would have liked it ok and given it 3 on all counts if it hadn't been defective... It has a cheesy sound, to be sure, and you hear the key action almost as much as you hear the tones. Might have really enjoyed the learning and interactive features. Box was very well constructive, arrived in good condition. Ordered for a gift but have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: T. deane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 yo because she wanted to play the piano. We got the stand with it and app suggested with the free trial then bought it. Both great also. She has learned so much in a short amount of time and and there is an infinite amount of options you can do on this keyboard! i love playing around on it also. You can’t beat this price for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Include app is a demo
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the piano and it’s pretty good for the value you pay. But they advertise the free subscription of Simply Piano but don’t claim it’s a demo version that ends. After reading the description now, it says a 90 day free subscription of the app but in actuality it’s 30 days because I bought this piano around Jan 15 and downloaded the app and now I have to pay for the app (Feb 18). So what they even advertise is wrong...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months now and it's working great. I have to occasionally return to the instruction manual for how to take advantage of some of its features, and the manual could be slightly clearer, but it's doing for me what I ultimately need it for, relearning to play.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an accomplished musician; but, I have not had a piano to play for about 15 years. I am so excited about this little keyboard. My brother is coming and he plays the guitar and sings professionally and he said that he found the same keyboard for $398 somewhere. We are gonna be jammin' for five days. Yay!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gulley

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it. It comes with a free subscription to a app that teaches you key by key how to play. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: It’s works fine as far as I can tell. I haven’t played in years so it was nice to have the app subscription that came with it to help!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley VanDerzee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and portable
customer_reviews.text: These little keyboards aren't super sturdy, but they are so lightweight and easy to transport! I used them in a theory class of mostly teens that I taught for a couple of weeks this summer. When I asked the group how valuable they felt the keyboards were for their learning, they said 8+. I am very happy I bought them--and I bought FIVE!
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Ard

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard! The package was received safe and sound (always a concern of mine that large packages will be damaged), but everything was great! My stepson plays this Keyboard all the time and loves it! Live how it has a headphone jack too.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Nice for money.
customer_reviews.text: Only wish I could hook up my phone to it. There is only a headphone jack and mic jack. But the simply app offer it comes with is a great way to learn!
customer_reviews.author: kari johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good value beginner keyboard
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner piano and for the price it’s not bad. A lot of features to choose from. My wife and I have been both learning the piano for a week now and having fun with it. A little concerned that last night a few keys had a slight buzzing sound to them considering I see reviews that after a few months it stopped working. Powering off then on again cleared it up. It seemed to happen after coming out of the auto sleep which occurs if you don’t play it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: sounds great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Little kids love to play on it; older kids like the sound and feel. Not weighted keys, but good response. All of the voices provide a good sound from all keys, unlike some better-known brands that had several voices which produced unrecognizable, non-musical noises in the bass registers.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sage

customer_reviews.title: Tinny Sound
customer_reviews.text: I returned this piano because of a broken key. I think it was the F4. I probably would have kept it despite the tinny sound. But I'd recommend, if you can afford it, to buy a yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V

customer_reviews.title: Rockjam is a go...
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old grandson got this for Christmas and he has had a great time. He loves to sing and he is experimenting on the piano while he sings. Hoping this will encourage him to want to take piano lessons. He is really enjoying it. It was a hit with his older brothers and younger cousins too. It is a great gift for any age.
customer_reviews.author: BETTY A CHAMPION

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as they make it sound.
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to get into the training mode and you have to play a monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: For the value it’s good though it does have a slight pause is
customer_reviews.text: For the value it’s good though it does have a slight pause is fuzzy Soum to it and obviously it’s not gonna sound good is a real piano or a high-end digital but you get what you pay for mine is held up coming through piano one I was able to practice whatever I wanted and I didn’t get very good I learned all the cords few simple songs and stuff like that it was
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard for beginners. It even comes with stickers you can place on the keys to teach what the keys are, if they are bass or treble, etc. Really good sound. Note, the starting volume is a bit loud, but can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: ACEM

customer_reviews.title: Nice key board for the cash
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid build for the money, sounds good has a decent amount of features. perfect for a beginner. I got for my 7 year old that's just learning to play so I didn't want to invest a lot of cash when I don't know how long she will stick with it. I would say its a medium sized key board for kids
customer_reviews.author: Tate Ryan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Defective keyboard with poor key balance.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived defective. The power button would not turn the unit on unless it was continuously depressed. Additionally, the volume varied dramatically from key to key, regardless of how hard the key was pressed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard! It teaches you how to play each song on it's playlist and the keys are more like a piano, which we like. I wish it took AA batteries, bc D batteries are annoying, but it does have a plug.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Loved the app that worked with the keyboard as well as the note stickers. Sound is clear and it has volume control which is nice when your child is learning.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Vespucci

customer_reviews.title: A key was not playing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this through Amazon and one of the keys wasn't working and they put me through this whole loop of contacting the seller for getting the item fixed. I know this is an odd case and it's a finger pointing game but these items should definitely be tested before shipping. Returning a huge item like this is such a time sink.
customer_reviews.author: Prithvi Karapa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely disappointed. Opened this box to find the key stickers had been cutup and used as if this were an opened box item. I did not select to recieve a used item which this clearly was along with someone else's hair stuck in the tape. This was a gift for my son's birthday and don't have time get another one. This product should have been inspected for all items to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Roc

customer_reviews.title: I understand I bought used, but for it NOT to work at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not even work and I bought it back in April and sent messages to buyer. Nothing was done and now it does not play any sounds whatsoever and mind you I haven't even turned the piano on since I bought it since the sound was awful.
customer_reviews.author: alicia roman

customer_reviews.title: When you turn it on, it's LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is good for kids. Everything works fine. I like the strap-on to the stand. The sound is OK. There's one large problem! When you turn on the keyboard, it comes on at full volume. So, when you press a key, it's way too loud. Yes, you can just turn it down, but it's bad design, and it's easy to forget about the problem every time you turn the keyboard on.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceOutMan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! My 7 yo daughter loves it! It has so many cool options! Great for beginners and comes with a book of sticker labels for the keys
customer_reviews.author: efonbuena79

customer_reviews.title: Feels and sounds really good
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting back into learning to play and so far it's been great. I found that I prefer the sound of it through headphones over the onboard speakers - I have yet to test adding an external speaker to improve sound quality, but even if I need to do that to make the keyboard sound even better, it's a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR KIDS THAT WANT TO LEARN
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays the piano and organ and we wanted to get this for our two youngest grandchildren ages 6 & 7. They are brother and sister so they live in the same house. It was easy for them to learn and perfect for a beginner. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: grandmawrinkles

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning keyboard basics.
customer_reviews.text: Has Great beginner lessons with small subscription fee. Teaches note recognition and correct finger placement. Granddaughter has taught herself how to play and is doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Was dead on arrival. Very disappointed as this was the main gift for my daughter who has been asking for one. Plugged in with adapter, nothing worked. Tried batteries only, again nothing. There’s a slight electrical smell. Guessing it shorted.? In this case you get what you paid for. $50 got us a dud.
customer_reviews.author: D. Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need it for.... ...
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need it for....included software for online lessons don't go very far before they want you to buy more. But that software was an add on I didn't expect anyway
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It's Nice But...
customer_reviews.text: If you really want to play keyboards you should get a longer key board. 76 keys. And get a dynamics pedal. And maybe Midi compatible. This one is good to play the basics. But, you will want more if you are doing anything other than playing at your home for yourself. I like it but....
customer_reviews.author: KylesVacations

customer_reviews.title: Basic keyboard, step above from a toy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not come with LCD. Basic keyboard, step above from a toy keyboard. Thought it would be ok for my child who is a beginner but I’m not sure... feels like a toy versus a musical instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

product_meta.title: RockJam (RJ549) 49-Key Portable Electric Keyboard Piano With Power Supply, Sheet Music Stand and Simply Piano App

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,039 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
